articles.author: Reuters.com
articles.title: Anglo American receives BHP buyout proposal, could reshape copper market - Reuters.com

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Hamas issues video showing Israeli-American hostage Goldberg-Polin - Reuters.com
articles.description: The Islamist movement Hamas published a video on Wednesday apparently showing Hersh Goldberg-Polin, an Israeli-American seized during Hamas's Oct. 7 attack on Israel and taken into Gaza, alive.
